long_description: This versatile adapter enables almost any bike carrier to be installed to a vehicle's factory rack. Strong and level load bars provide the ideal platform for bike carrier mounting. Works with Thule Criterium and Big Mouth upright carriers as well as V2 and Velo Vise, all sold separately. Includes two 32" load bars and tamper-resistant universal mounting hardwear. Two bike maximum capacity.
short_description: This versatile adapter enables almost any bike carrier to be installed to a vehicle's factory rack.
